extensionDescription.message: Thematic eh um alterador de estilo para a web gratuito

siteEnabledPopup.description: Popup checkbox to enable or disable the extension in a specific website

invertColorsPopup.description: Popup checkbox to invert colors in a specific website

optionsBtnPopup.description: Button that lead to the extension options from the popup

changeStyleOptions.description: Change style text in the options page, for the title and sidebar

choosePaletteType.description: Label for the select box that picks a palette to edit

pagePaletteType.description: Text for the select option that will specify the palette for general page colors

pagePaletteHint.message: Escolha a paleta que sera utilizada para mudar todos os elementos da pagina, exceto o texto.
pagePaletteHint.description: Hint that shows when the page palette option is selected

textPaletteType.description: Text for the select option that will specify the palette for text page colors

textPaletteHint.message: Escolha a paleta que sera utilizada para mudar as cores do texto.
textPaletteHint.description: Hint that shows when the text palette option is selected

removeColorBtn.description: Text for the button that removes a color from the selected palette

addColorBtn.description: Text for the button that adds a color to the selected palette
